STARTUP.description: Small startups with limited budgets and basic requirements

SME.description: Small to medium enterprises with moderate budgets

ENTERPRISE.description: Large enterprises with substantial budgets and strict requirements

GOVERNMENT.description: Government agencies with high security and compliance requirements

CONSERVATIVE.description: Prefers established providers with high reputation

BALANCED.description: Balances price, SLA, and reputation equally

AGGRESSIVE.description: Focuses primarily on price with acceptable quality

QUALITY_FOCUSED.description: Prioritizes SLA and reputation over price

metadata.description: NPC catalog for datacenter tycoon game with realistic business profiles
